en: Behold, bless ye Jehovah, all ye servants of Jehovah, That by night stand in the house of Jehovah.
hmr: Ngai ta u, LALPA siehlaw, LALPA ina zâna ngîr hlak po pohai, LALPA chu inpâk ro.

en: Lift up your hands to the sanctuary, And bless ye Jehovah.
hmr: In kuthai chu hmun inthieng tienga chun phar unla, LALPA chu inpâk ro.

en: Jehovah bless thee out of Zion; Even he that made heaven and earth.
hmr: LALPA chun Ziona inthawkin malsâwm raw se cheu, Hnuoi le vân siemtu ngei chun.
